item.title: California’s salmon fishermen are making their living from whale watchers and sea burials because the fishery is closed for a 2nd year
item.description: Salmon must swim upstream to lay their eggs, and young fish make their way out to the ocean through California's waterways — something done more easil...

item.title: Russia and China hitting Western democracies with ‘massive digital arsenals’ says EU
item.description: "We must not underestimate the power that this has over us, or the intentions of those behind it."

item.title: Dolce & Gabbana looks beyond fashion to safeguard independence
item.description: Dolce & Gabbana bets on beauty for independence, eyeing €1 billion in sales by 2027 as it expands beyond fashion into real estate and hospitality.

item.title: After public backlash over a confusing abortion ruling, Arizona’s Supreme Court is using human-like AI avatars named Victoria and Daniel to explain its decisions
item.description: The new chief justice says an avatar video could have helped the public better understand the legal underpinnings of the lengthy decision.
